highest reversal accuracy.from sentence: The RNTN has the highest reversal accuracy , showing its ability to structurally learn negation of positive sentences .

typical case.from sentence: shows a typical case in which sentiment was made more positive by switching the main class from negative to neutral even though both not and dull were negative .

conclude.from sentence: Therefore we can conclude that the RNTN is best able to identify the effect of negations upon both positive and negative sentiment sentences . :
